bulkOperation.desc: All projects parameters with the project item ID (data state, tempo, global BPM, metronome triplet, metronome size, wait to load, global swing, current scene, user scale1, user scale 2)
All projects parameters with the project item ID (ARP track 2 triplet, ARP track 2 size, ARP track 3 triplet, ARP track 3 size, ARP track 4 triplet, ARP track 4 size)
MIDI channel parameters (track 1 Seq, track 2, track 3, track 4, track 1 Drum)
Track is in transpose group (track 1, track 2, track 3, track 4)
ARP swing (track 2, track 3, track 4)

multibulk.desc: MIDI channel

bulkOperation.multibulk_desc: All scenes parameters (16 scenes in a project)

multibulk.desc: Scene idx parameters (data state, current track, chain state, mute state, solo state, DRUM mute state)
Scene idx parameters (scene / track Control / current pattern)
Scene idx parameters (scene / track 1 / current pattern)
Scene idx parameters (scene / track 2 / current pattern)
Scene idx parameters (scene / track 3 / current pattern)
Scene idx parameters (scene / track 4 / current pattern)
Scene idx parameters (scene / tracks / chain (16 pattern in a chain) (value between 0 and 15 if defined, otherwise 127))

bulkOperation.desc: Track Control parameters (data state, transposition octave, transposition state, keyboard octave, chord mode state, transposition)
Track Control parameters (chord (16 chord per track))

multibulk.desc: Track Control parameters (chord)

bulkOperation.desc: Track Control / Pattern idx parameters (16 pattern per track))

multibulk.desc: Pattern idx parameters (data state, triplet state, step size, step count, knob pitch default CC, knob gate length default CC, knob velocity default CC, knob time shift default CC, knob randomness default CC)
Pattern idx / Step idx parameters (step 1 -> 16) (step active, step skip, knob pitch CC, knob gate length CC, knob velocity CC, knob time shift CC, knob randomness CC)
Pattern idx / Step idx parameters (step 17 -> 32) (step active, step skip, knob pitch CC, knob gate length CC, knob velocity CC, knob time shift CC, knob randomness CC)
Pattern idx / Step idx parameters (step 33 -> 48) (step active, step skip, knob pitch CC, knob gate length CC, knob velocity CC, knob time shift CC, knob randomness CC)
Pattern idx / Step idx parameters (step 49 -> 64) (step active, step skip, knob pitch CC, knob gate length CC, knob velocity CC, knob time shift CC, knob randomness CC)

bulkOperation.desc: Track 1 parameters (data state, transposition octave, transposition state, keyboard octave, chord mode state, transposition, Track color)
Track 1 parameters (chord (16 chord per track))

multibulk.desc: Track 1 parameters (chord)

bulkOperation.desc: Track 1 / Pattern idx parameters (16 pattern per track))

multibulk.desc: Empty pattern
Pattern idx seq parameters (triplet state, step size, step count, swing, swing offset state, polyrythm state, playback direction, ARP/DRUM mode, ARP type, ARP octave, root note)

Pattern idx / Step seq parameters (step 17 -> 32) (step active, step skip)

fields.comment: Tempo is divided into 3 part (MSB - MidSB - LSB)

fields.name: Project tempo part 2 (MidSB)

fields.comment: Tempo is divided into 3 part (MSB - MidSB - LSB)
fields.name: Project tempo part 1 (MSB)
global BPM, metronome triplet, metronome size, wait to load in a bitfield
Scene / Current track, Scene / Chain state in a bitfield

fields.comment: Drum mute state is divided into 4 part (MSB - MidMSB - MidLSB - LSB)

fields.name: Drum mute state part 1 (MSB)
Track transposition state, transposition octave in a bitfield
Track keyboard octave, chord mode state, Arp/Drum mode state in a bitfield
Pattern CC triplet state, step size in a bitfield
Pattern Seq swing (%) (an offset of 25 is applied to be send by MIDI) (-25% to +25%)
Pattern Seq triplet state, swing offset state, polyrythm state, step size, playback direction in a bitfield
Pattern Seq ARP/Drum mode, ARP type, ARP octave in a bitfield

Pattern DRUM swing (%) (an offset of 25 is applied to be send by MIDI) (-25% to +25%)
Pattern DRUM triplet state, swing offset state, polyrythm state, step size, playback direction in a bitfield
